title: The Notebook
overview: A poor and passionate young man falls in love with a rich young woman and gives her a sense of freedom, but they soon are separated by their social differences. Based on the best-selling novel by Nicholas Sparks.

title: The Best Years of Our Lives
overview: Three World War II veterans return home to small-town America to discover that they and their families have been irreparably changed.
originalTitle: The Best Years of Our Lives

title: Press Play
overview: Laura and Harrison have the picture-perfect romance built on the foundation of a shared love of music. After a deadly accident, Laura is given the chance to save the love of her life when she discovers that their mixtape can transport her back in time.

title: The Best Years of a Life
originalTitle: Les plus belles années d'une vie

title: Love, Fashion, Repeat
overview: When Lisa returns to her hometown to seek inspiration for her new fashion line, meeting a handsome writer is the last thing she expects.

title: The Story of Love
overview: Ruby, an aspiring romance novelist, joins a writers retreat in Tahoe hosted by her literary hero and hottest writer around, Marcus Harlow, in order to win a lucrative book deal. But when Woody, the outdoorsy hotel owner, shows her the beauty of nature, Ruby wonders if she's been writing the wrong kinds of stories to impress people like Marcus.

title: Pretty Little Stalker
overview: When a self-help author doles out some bad advice, she and her family become the targets of an obsessive young woman with a thirst for vengeance.
